summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Assessment Editor (Claude Projects clone). All backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI functional with successful AI integration using Claude Sonnet 4.5.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes for accessibility
Dark theme not detected in body class during initial load test

passed_tests: All 18 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Project CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete, star)
AI chat integration with Claude Sonnet 4.5
Project detail page with tabs (Files, Conversations)

success_percentage.integration: 100% (AI chat, file upload, navigation all working)
